attributes.action: ban the sale or display of Christmas items before the 1st of December every year
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Christmas seems to creep up earlier and earlier every year and it's getting silly, frankly. Christmas is in December and the UK would be a far happier place if it was kept to December. People might start enjoying the festive season again instead of dreading it and hating it.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
